column4: Is there a difference (even if minimal) between installing a command-line system with the alternate CD and installing it from the server CD ?
pretty sure the server gives you a different kernel at least (yes)
I want to install it and then install fluxbox on it ....can I do that?
yes
which is more minimal (regardless of the kernel issue) alternate CD text-mode or Server install ?
if you want minimal, use the minimal cd.  If you want a server use the server install.  If you want a text-based system that will not be primarily a server, use the alt-cd
thank you very much jrib :)
try #mplayer
tried :( no use
how do you change brightness?  I'll test here
using the number 3 button
not saved here but I am on arch
hmm, I see
I am using mplayer from the repos
maybe I will cimpile?
compile*
check if debian added any patches
you're on jaunty?
yes on jaunty, do you think it's a bug, or just normal behavior
it would be a pretty weird bug for it to save the information somewhere.  Maybe you can run strace and see if it writes anywhere?
ok I will try, thanks for your help jrib  :) very much appreciated
